lead_paragraph: Saina Nehwal is better equipped to win a medal in Rio in August than the Indian shuttler was when she claimed a bronze at the London Olympics four years ago, former All England champion Prakash Padukone told Reuters.

headline.print_headline: New-Look Nehwal Primed for Rio Success-Padukone
headline.main: New-Look Nehwal Primed for Rio Success-Padukone

snippet: Saina Nehwal is better equipped to win a medal in Rio in August than the Indian shuttler was when she claimed a bronze at the London Olympics four years ago, former All England champion Prakash Padukone told Reuters....
